class.name: AudioEffectNoise
class.brief_description: Adds noise to an audio bus.
class.description: It mixes the audio in a bus with colored noise such as, white, brown, gray, pink and violet noise. The different colors are generated by passing the output of normal random number generator from a filter.

members.member: The standard deviation of input normal random number distribution.
Adjusts contribution of noise to the audio in the bus.
Selects noise type from a list of [code]White, Brown, Pink, Violet and Gray[/code].
